==Goals==

  * To extend search capabilities of the modern math search engines by resolving sophisticated semantic queries

  * To make mathematical documents (papers, reports, slides etc.) semantically enriched

  * To describe some parts of mathematics with ontological formalisms

  * To make the world better:-)
